query:
SELECT rl.id, rl.lojaId, l.nome as lojaNome, rl.gestorId, u.name as gestorCriador, rl.dataVisita
FROM relatorios_livres rl
INNER JOIN lojas l ON rl.lojaId = l.id
INNER JOIN gestores g ON rl.gestorId = g.id
INNER JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE rl.lojaId IN (
  SELECT gl.lojaId FROM gestor_lojas gl 
  INNER JOIN gestores g2 ON gl.gestorId = g2.id
  INNER JOIN users u2 ON g2.userId = u2.id
  WHERE u2.name LIKE '%Fábio%' OR u2.name LIKE '%Fabio%'
)
ORDER BY rl.dataVisita DESC;
